Class CampCommittee

java.lang.Object
User
Student
CampCommittee
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserActions
public class CampCommittee extends Student
The CampCommittee represents a student who is a committee member of the camp. The camp committee will have all the functionality of Student. The extra functionality of camp committee from Student are viewing/submitting/editing/deleting suggestion, replying to student's enquiries, and generating the camp report (the report will contains the information of who have registered for the camp). It extends the Student class and includes extra functionality specific to camp committee.

    • CampCommittee

      public CampCommittee(String userID, String password, String email, String faculty, boolean isLocked, Camp camp)
      Constructs a new CampCommittee with an empty submittedSuggestions.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the committee member.
      password - The password of the committee member.
      email - The email address of the committee member.
      faculty - The faculty of the committee member.
      isLocked - A boolean indicating if the account is locked.
      camp - The camp associated with the committee member.

    • CampCommittee

      public CampCommittee(String userID, String password, String email, String faculty, boolean isLocked, HashMap<Integer,Enquiry> enquiryMap, HashMap<Integer,Camp> registeredCamps, ArrayList<Date> blockedDates, Camp camp, HashMap<Integer,Suggestion> submittedSuggestions, Integer point)
      Constructs a new CampCommittee with non-empty submittedSuggestions.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the committee member.
      password - The password of the committee member.
      email - The email address of the committee member.
      faculty - The faculty of the committee member.
      isLocked - A boolean indicating if the account is locked.
      enquiryMap - A map of enquiries of the committee member.
      registeredCamps - A map of registered camp of the committee member.
      blockedDates - A list of dates the committee member is not available.
      camp - The camp associated with the committee member.
      submittedSuggestions - A map of submitted suggestions from the committee member.
      point - The committee point of the committee member.
